pages.text: The Ancient Remnant is a strong boss that is located in the cursed pyramid in a desert.$(br2)The ancient remnant is a tough boss that destroys many blocks with lots of minions.
Ancient remnant, only activated by using a desert necklace.

pages.title: Eye of the Desert
pages.text: You use this eye the same way you would use an eye of ender to find the cursed pyramid.$(br2)When you find this pyramid you will need to find the necklace of the desert in order to activate the boss.
You must use a brush to sift away suspicious sand that is located inside of the pyramid.$(br2)Inside one of the sands will be the necklace of the desert which you need to activate the boss battle.
This behemoth is found roaming inside of the cursed pyramid. On death he drops his head!
The Wadjet is a snake like mob that will cast spells on you. On death it drops ancient metal used for armor.
This item will allow you to turn into a sandstorm and is dropped by the Ancient Remnant. You become invincible and you get to FLY!

pages.title: Bone Reptile Set
pages.text: The bone reptile set is very bulky and will give you a decent bit of knockback res.
The Ancient Remnant will also drop its head which allows you to summon a mini remnant called the Modern Remnant.$(br2)This remnant wil protect you and gaurd you forever as a pet.

pages.title: Modern Remnant
pages.text: The modern remnant is suprisingly very strong.
